page.title: 14Beating Day.
page.content: Dad's a gamekeeper and on beating day morning all the farmers come to my house for a cup of tea bringing their vans and dogs with them. First we go to Rosemary Steel's farm where we put on our boots before setting off over fields through puddles of mud. Finally we come to the wood and all the beat- ers find a stick to beat the bushes. The shooters load their guns alert for the odd pheasant,woodcock,rabbit or hare. Suddenly there's a big panic and the men all fire at the same time and kill the birds. Then they let their dogs off the leads to retrieve the birds. The game is taken back to my house to be hung in the game larder to keep fresh.Dad later processes it re- moving fur and feathers while my Nan and Uncle prepare them for the super- market.
